unit.name: Saurus Oldblood
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and light armour. Special Rules: Scaly Skin (5+), Bite Attack.

unit.name: Slann
unit.description: Magic: A Slann is a Level 5 wizard. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Ward Save (4+), Slann.

equipment.name: PM Servant of the O. O. 3/4+
BM Wrath of the O. O.
BM Fury of the O. O.

unit.name: Battle Standard
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and light armour. Special Rules: Scaly Skin (5+), Bite Attack.

unit.name: Saurus Scar Veteran
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and light armour. Special Rules: Scaly Skin (5+), Bite Attack.

unit.name: Skink Chief
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and light armour. Special Rules: Aquatic, Jungle Poisons, Scaly Skin (6+).

unit.name: Skink Priest
unit.description: Magic: A Skink Priest is a Level 2 wizard. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Aquatic, Jungle Poisons, Scaly Skin (6+).

unit.name: Saurus Warrior
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and shield. Special Rules: Scaly Skin (5+), Block (Shield), Sacred Duty, Bite Attack.

unit.name: Saurus Spearman
unit.description: Equipment: Spear and shield. Special Rules: Scaly Skin (5+), Anti-Cav (Spear), Sacred Duty, Bite Attack.

unit.name: Skink Warriors
unit.description: Equipment: Javelin and shield. Special Rules: Light Infantry, Aquatic, Jungle Poisons, Scaly Skin (6+).

unit.name: Skink Hunter
unit.description: Equipment: Blowpipe. Special Rules: Light Infantry, Aquatic, Jungle Poisons, Scaly Skin (6+).

unit.name: Jungle Swarm
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Skirmishers, Small, Unbreakable (Swarm), Poisoned Attacks (1).

unit.name: Temple Guard
unit.description: Equipment: Halberd, light armour and shield. Special Rules: Scaly Skin (5+), Stubborn, Immune to Psychology, Sacred Duty, Bite Attack.

unit.name: Kroxigor
unit.description: Equipment: Great Weapon. Special Rules: Scaly Skin (4+), Fear, Aquatic, Skink Cohorts.

unit.name: Saurus Cavalry
unit.description: Mount: Cold One. Equipment: Spear and shield. Special Rules: Heavy Cavalry, Scaly Skin (5+), Fear, Stupidity, Thick Skinned, Bite Attack

unit.name: Chameleon Skink
unit.description: Equipment: Blowpipe. Special Rules: Skirmisher, Scouts, Aquatic, Scaly Skin (6+), Jungle Poisons, Chameleons.

unit.name: Teradon Rider
unit.description: Mount: Teradon. Equipment: Javelin. Special Rules: Jungle Poisons, Flying Skirmishers, Scaly Skin (6+), Hit and Run, Arboreal Predators, March Blocker, Drop Rocks.

unit.name: Ripperdactyl Rider
unit.description: Mount: Ripperdactyl. Equipment: Spear and shield. Special Rules: Jungle Poisons, Flying Unit, Scaly Skin (6+), Arboreal Predators, Frenzy (Ripperdactyl only), Killing Blow (Ripperdactyl only), Bloat Toads.

unit.name: Stegadon
unit.description: Monster: 1 Stegadon and 5 Skink Crew. Equipment: The crew is armed with javelins and one Giant Bow. Special Rules: Stubborn, Terror, Large Target, Impact Hits (D3+2), Jungle Poisons, Immune to Psychology, Scaly Skin (4+, Ancient Stegadon 3+).

equipment.name: Ancient Stegadon: Engine of the Gods

unit.name: Bastiladon
unit.description: Monster: 1 Bastiladon and 4 Skink Crew. Equipment: The crew is armed with javelins and an Ark of Sotek. Special Rules: Terror, Large Target, Jungle Poisons, Immune to Psychology, Scaly Skin (3+), Walking Fortress.

unit.name: Troglodon
unit.description: Monster: 1 Troglodon and 1 Skink Oracle. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Terror, Large Target, Poisoned Attacks (1), Scaly Skin (4+), Spit Venom, Oracle.

unit.name: Salamander Hunting Pack
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Aquatic, Fear (Salamanders only), Light Infantry, Spout Flames, Lizard Pack, Unreliable, Scaly Skin (5+ Salamander / 6+ Skink Handler).

unit.name: Razordon Hunting Pack
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Aquatic, Fear (Razordons only), Light Infantry, Shoot Barbs, Lizard Pack, Unreliable, Scaly Skin (5+ Razordon / 6+ Skink Handler).

mount.name: Cold One
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Thick-skinned, Stupidity, Fear.

mount.name: Teradon Alpha
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Model, Arboreal Predators, March Blocker.

mount.name: Carnosaur
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Terror, Large Target, Scaly Skin (4+), Blood Frenzy, Carnivore. Note: Does not count as a Dino regarding point costs!

item.name: Amulet of Itzl
item.description: Bearer gains a Ward Save (2+) vs his first wound suffered.

item.name: Aquatic
item.description: This unit does not suffer movement penalties for moving through water terrain.

item.name: Arboreal Predators
item.description: This unit ignores movement penalties when moving through woods, even while flying. It also may start and/or end its movement in woods.

item.name: Arcane Mastery
item.description: Once per magic phase, after the model cast a spell and before a dispel attempt is made, the model may roll an additional (free) PD and add the result to the casting roll (may cause IF or a miscast).

item.name: Ark of Sotek
item.description: If the model is not in cc, then the Ark of Sotek can be used in the shooting phase for the following effects: -Each enemy unit within 6" suffers 2D6 S2 hits. In addition nominate one Jungle Swarm unit within 6" of Bastiladon and roll a D6: on a roll of 4+ add one base to the Jungle Swarm unit. This can increase the Jungle Swarm unit beyond its starting size. Jungle Swarm bases generated in this way do not grant VP.

item.name: Aura of Quetzl
item.description: Ward Save (4+) vs attacks with S5 or more

item.name: BM Dazzling Brightness
item.description: (6+) Hex, Range 18", target unit suffers -2WS (to a minimum of 1) until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: BM Drain Magic
item.description: In the next (enemy) magic phase, casters suffer -2 to cast BM spells. This effect stacks up to -6.

item.name: BM Fury of the Old Ones
BM Fury of the O. O.
item.description: (9+) MM, Range 24", 2D6 S4 hits

item.name: BM Portent of Far
item.description: (5+) Augment, Range 18", target unit may reroll 1s to-hit and to-wound until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: BM Shades of Death
item.description: (6+) Augment, Range 18", unit causes Fear. If it already causes Fear, unit causes Terror instead. Lasts until casters next magic phase.

item.name: BM The Beast Cowers
item.description: BM The Beast Cowers (9+): Hex, Range 24". Target unit halves its M (including mounts). Flyers have to use their ground movement but do not half their M. Target unit cannot declare a charge or charge even if it would be forced to (e.g. because of Frenzy). Units with Random Movement stop 1" in front of enemy units. Further, the target unit suffers -1 for to-hit rolls in cc. Lasts until the casters next magic phase. The spell has no effect on Infantry (Type Inf).

item.name: BM Transmutation of Lead
item.description: (7+) Hex, Range 24", target unit suffers -1 to-hit and -1 to-wound in cc as well as -1AS until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: BM Undergrowth
item.description: (7+) Hex or Augment, Range 18", target unit counts as being in difficult terrain and light cover until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: BM Uranons Thunder Bolt
item.description: (8+) MM, Range 24", D6 S4 hits, noAS

item.name: BM Warp Hole
item.description: (13+) Direct Damage, Range 18”, 5” template, S5, no AS. Target a point within the target unit. If the target point is out of range, the spell has no effect. If the target point is within range, place the template with its center over the target point and resolve it. A unit that suffers one or more casualties must take a panic test.

item.name: BM Wrath of the Old Ones
BM Wrath of the O. O.
item.description: (9+) MM, Range 24", D3 hits, auto wound, no AS

item.name: Bane Head
item.description: Nominate one enemy character at the start of battle (after deployment). Wounds inflicted to this character (after saves) are doubled, i.e. 1 wound = 2 wounds.

item.name: Becalming
item.description: Model may re-roll its first failed dispel attempt each magic phase.

item.name: Bite Attack
item.description: In cc the model attacks with one (1) bite attack in addition to its normal attacks. Bite attacks are unaffected by special rules of weapons the model uses in cc, i.e. resolve the bite attack as if the model was equipped with a hand weapon. Frenzy has no effect on bite attacks.

item.name: Blade of Chotec
item.description: AP (2)

item.name: Blade of Realities
item.description: hits ignore Ward Saves (armour saves and regeneration are allowed)

item.name: Blade of Revered Tzunki
item.description: +1S, no AS

item.name: Blessing of the Old Ones
Blessing of the O.O.
item.description: Model ignores all miscast effects (i.e. the casting still fails but do not roll on the miscast table) (BM and PM).

item.name: Bloat Toads
item.description: After scouts have been deployed, place one toad marker for each unit of Ripperdactyl Riders in an enemy unit. All Ripperdactyls (mounts only) re-roll all failed to-hit rolls against these units.

item.name: Blood Frenzy
item.description: Once the Carnosaur inflicted its first unsaved wound, it suffers from Frenzy until the end of the game, i.e. the Carnosaur never loses its Frenzy. Does not affect the rider.

item.name: Blowpipe
item.description: Range 12", S3, Multiple Shot (2), Poisoned Attacks (1)

item.name: Carnivore
item.description: The Carnosaur causes D3 wounds to Large Targets. Does not affect the rider.

item.name: Chameleons
item.description: Additional -1 modifier for shooting at this unit. This unit may be set up like Scouts but can ignore the minimum distance to enemy units as long as it is out of sight. In addition this unit may be set up in sight of enemy units but has to stay at least 12" away.

item.name: Charm of the Jaguar Warrior
item.description: The bearer gains M9. Models on foot only.

item.name: Cloak of Feathers
item.description: The bearer may Fly but cannot be deployed as a scout. Models on foot only.

item.name: Cold Blooded
item.description: All Lizardmen units roll 3D6 for Ld-based tests and pick the 2 lowest dice.

item.name: Cube of Darkness
item.description: +1DD

item.name: Cupped Hands
item.description: May force an opponent to reroll the result on the miscast table.

item.name: Daggers of Sotek
item.description: counts as additional hand weapons and grants KB

item.name: Devine Plaque of Protection
item.description: MR 1

item.name: Diadem of Power
item.description: +1 Power Dice every magic phase, may only be used by the bearer.

item.name: Dispel Scroll
item.description: Automatically dispels one spell without the need of DD. One use only.

item.name: Dragonfly of Quicksilver
item.description: The Lizardmen player gains +1 to the roll to deploy scouts first.

item.name: Drop Rocks
item.description: This unit is armed with Drop Rocks that can be used once per game for one of the following effects: - The unit (i.e. each model) gains Impact Hits (1) for their first successful charge. - The unit may drop rocks on a unit that they moved over (at least partially) during the movement phase. Each Terradon Rider shoots D3 S4 shots that hit like templates. This attack is part of the shooting phase and hits are distributed exactly like hits from shooting. Skinks may still shoot in the shooting phase, even at a different unit.

item.name: Enchanted Shield
item.description: Shield that grants +2 AS

item.name: Engine of the Gods
Ancient Stegadon: Engine of the Gods
item.description: This unit may cast one of the following spells in each own magic phase: -Arcane Configuration (PM 2/5+): Augment, until the end of the magic phase the casting values of all battle magic spells are reduced by one. This effect is not cumulative. -Blazing Configuration (PM 2/7+): MM, Range 12", D6 S4 hits -Protecting Configuration (PM 2/5+): Augment, self, all friendly units within 12" get a Ward Save (5+) vs ranged attacks (incl. magic missiles) made from more than 12" away from the Engine. Lasts until the Engines next magic phase.

item.name: Giant Blowpipe
Ancient Stegadon: 2 Giant Blowpipes
item.description: Range 12", S3, Multiple Shot (2D6), Poisoned Attacks (1), only one model is needed to operate one Giant Blowpipe, i.e. other models are free to use missile weapons in the shooting phase (but remember that the whole model has to shoot at the same target)

item.name: Giant Bow
item.description: Range 36", S5, Poisoned Attacks (1), penetrates ranks, no Stand & Shoot, Large Targets suffer 2 wounds, only one model is needed to operate the Giant Bow, i.e. other models are free to use missile weapons in the shooting phase (but remember that the whole model has to shoot at the same target)

item.name: Gleaming Pendant of Chotec
Gleaming Pend. of Chotec
item.description: Can be used in the Lizardmen players turn. Enemy units in btb with the bearer and his unit gain ASL until the end of turn. One use only.

item.name: Glyph Necklace
item.description: Ward Save (5+)

item.name: Harmonic Convergence
item.description: +1 to cast (BM and PM)

item.name: Harrowing Scrutiny
item.description: Model causes Terror.

item.name: Higher State of Consciousness
Higher State of Consciousn.
item.description: Ward Save (2+) vs ranged attacks (incl. magic missiles but not spells)

item.name: Hit and Run
item.description: If this unit charged and loses or ties combat in the following combat phase, it has to retreat. If this unit won combat, it is allowed to retreat. A retreat follows the same rules as if the unit had to flee from combat but it does not cause panic, the enemy is not allowed to pursue and this unit automatically rallies at the end of the flee movement.

item.name: Huanchis Blessed Totem
item.description: Unit gains +1M.

item.name: Jaguar Standard
item.description: Unit rolls an additional D6" when pursuing.

item.name: Jungle Poisons
item.description: All attacks (CC and RC) made by a Skink with a mundane weapon without the Poisoned Attacks special rule (e.g. hand weapons, javelins etc.) are treated as having the Poisoned Attacks (1) special rule, i.e. it has no effect on magic weapons and does not stack with poisoned weapons. Mounts are not affected.

item.name: Lizard Pack
item.description: - The unit consists of Salamanders (/Barbed Razordons) and Handlers. Fill ranks with Salamanders first then with Handlers. If the unit comprises a single Salamander (/Barbed Razordon), the unit may form a formation with a frontage of less than 60mm. - Randomise ranged hits between Salamanders (1-5) and Handlers (6). - If no Handlers are left in the unit, then the unit suffers from Stupidity. - In cc Handlers do not have to step up as long as there are enough Salamanders left for all remaing Handlers to be placed behind. Up to 3 Handlers may be placed behind each Salamander (in two ranks if necessary). - Handlers are ignored for determining rank bonuses. - If all Salamanders are slain, the unit is destroyed. If the unit is destroyed in close combat, Handlers destroyed in this way do not count towards combat resolution. - Characters cannot join this unit.

item.name: Misfire
item.description: Salamander kills D3 Skink Handlers.

item.name: Oracle
item.description: This unit may cast the following spell: - Primordial Ferocity (PM 2/5+): Augment, affects all friendly units within 12", affected units gain the following special rule until the next casters magic phase: For each to-hit roll of a natural 6 in close combat, the model gets another attack rolling to wound and to hit as normal. Additional attacks do not generate further attacks.

item.name: PM Clairvoyance 2/3+
PM Clairvoyance 3/3+
item.description: Target one unit on the board. Your opponent has to reveal any hidden models and magic items (but not which model has them) in that unit.

item.name: PM Corrosive Venom 2/5+
PM Corrosive Venom 3/5+
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit gets AP(1) (cc as well as shooting), until next casters magic phase. Has no effect on magic items.

item.name: PM Cure 2/7+
PM Cure 3/7+
item.description: Augment, Range 18", target model recovers 1 wound

item.name: PM Forced Evolution 2/5+
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit incl. characters gets Ld8 until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: PM Second Sign of Amul 2/5+
PM 2nd Sign of Amul 3/5+
PM Second Sign of Amul 3/5+
item.description: The player gets D3 rerolls. Each reroll can be used to reroll one to-hit roll, to-wound roll, armour save or ward save. Any rerolls not used at the end of the players turn are wasted.

item.name: PM Servant of the Old Ones 2/4+
PM Servant of the Old Ones 3/4+
PM Servant of the O. O. 3/4+
item.description: Augment, cast on friendly character model on foot (US1) within 12", model may immediately make a 20" fly movement. This move can be used to leave cc but cannot be used to enter combat (i.e. charging is not possible).

item.name: Piranha Blade
item.description: each inflicted wound (after saves) is doubled, i.e. 1 wound = 2 wounds

item.name: Plaque of Dominion
item.description: PM 2/3+, Hex. All enemy wizards within 18" and with line of sight to the bearer gain Stupidity until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Power Stone
item.description: +2PD to cast a spell. Dice used may exceed maximum allowed by level. One use only.

item.name: Rod of the Storm
item.description: PM 2/5+, MM, Rang 18", 2D6 S3 AP(1) hits. A unit that suffers at least one casualty has to take a panic test. One use only.

item.name: Runes of Wrath
item.description: Instead of attacking normally in cc this model may inflict D6 S4 hits to a unit in btb. Hits are distributed like shooting.

item.name: Sacred Duty
item.description: A Slann may join the unit. It may be placed anywhere in the unit, facing in the same direction as the unit. In cc the Slann can only attack or be attacked if it is in btb with an enemy model. As long as there are enough rank and file models left to hide behind (i.e. 2), the Slann does not have to step up. The unit counts their rank bonus as if the space the Slann takes up was filled with rank and file models.

item.name: Sacred Stegadon Helm
S. Stegadon Helm
item.description: +1AS, +1T, bearer gains Impact Hits (1). Models on foot only.

item.name: Scout (models on foot only)
Scouts (special rule)
item.description: A unit with this special rule is set up after both armies have been deployed. It may be deployed anywhere on the board but outside of the opponents deployment zone. If it is deployed outside of its own deployment zone it has to be deployed more than 12" away from enemy units and completely out of sight of enemy units and/or within cover. For this purpose all enemy units have 360 deg. AOS. If both armies include scouts, both players roll a D6. The player rolling the highest starts deploying one of his scout units. Thereafter players alternate deploying one scout unit at a time.

item.name: Shield of the Mirrored Pool
item.description: Shield. Rebounds spells cast directly at the bearer or its unit (i.e. not templates like Vermin Tide" or table effects like Rise of the Bloodmoon") at the roll (W6) of a 4+, the bearer counting as the caster of the spell. If the bearer as the caster does not meet the requirements (see spell categories" in chapter Magic Phase) of the spell, the spell counts as dispelled (even if cast with irresistible force) and does not rebound. Rebounded spells can be dispelled by using PD as DD for the attempt.

item.name: Shoot Barbs
item.description: Number of shots = Artillery Dice, S4 Range 12", ignores to hit modifiers for moving and multiple shots. Misfire: Razordon kills D3 Skink Handlers.

item.name: Skink Cohorts
item.description: Units of Kroxigors ignore unengaged friendly Skink units that consist only of models with US1, for the purpose of charging, i.e. they measure LOS and move through these units. Charging units will use the shortest distance to the target unit which means that Kroxigors have to charge through skink units if this is the shortest charge lane. Each Skink unit that made way for Kroxigors in this way, has to pass a Ld-test or cannot move in the remaining moves movement phase.

item.name: Slann
item.description: The model counts as a Large Target for LOS purposes. It can only join units with the Sacred Duty special rule.

item.name: Solar Engine
item.description: All Lizardmen units within 6" gain +1I. In addition this unit may cast the following spell: -Solar Flare (PM 2/5+): MM, Range 24", D3 S4 hits, target unit suffers -1BS and -1WS until the Engines next magic phase.

item.name: Spit Venom
item.description: Counts as a Thrown Weapon, Range 12", S5, Multiple Shot (2)

item.name: Spout Flames
item.description: Flamer Weapon, Range 0", S3, AP(3). Misfire: Salamander kills D3 Skink Handlers. If the unit comprises multiple Salamanders, resolve each ranged attack one after the other (and against the same target).

item.name: Staff of Sorcery
item.description: +1 to total roll to attempt to dispel a spell.

item.name: Staff of the Lost Sun
item.description: Ranged Weapon, Range 18", S5, Multiple Shots (3)

item.name: Sun Standard of Chotec
item.description: Ranged attacks at this unit suffer -1 to hit.

item.name: Sword of Hornet
item.description: Always Strike First

item.name: The Maiming Shield
item.description: +1AS and +1A at base strength (counts as magical)

item.name: Thick Skinned
item.description: The mount grants its rider an additional +1AS modifier.

item.name: Totem of Prophecy
item.description: Unit causes Fear.

item.name: Unreliable
item.description: This unit has to roll on its misfire chart if it suffers a misfire.

item.name: Venom of Firefly Frog
item.description: All attacks made by the berarer with mundane weapons (ranged and cc) gain Poisoned Attacks (1) and count as magical. The poison does stack if the weapon already has the Poisoned Attacks special rule.

item.name: Walking Fortress
item.description: Enemies fighting this unit in cc do not gain bonuses for fighting in its flank or rear.

item.name: War Banner
item.description: +1CR
